text:
Projectify is a full project management system created with TiddlyWiki. Here we present the [[Dashboard]].

title: About

text: This should be good for a nice standards based install that completes Livecode. However TiddlyWiki Multiserver is probably the main development direction? Need to work out asap what we do regarding multiauthor collaboration.
title: Gitea integration

text: Hitchhiker's Guide to Earth is a new project to create performative engagements between citizens and Earth.
title: Hitchhiker's Guide to Earth

text:
Looks like there is some good work to create a Kanban view of [[Projectify]] todos:

* https://neotw.vercel.app/#%24%3A%2Fplugins%2Foeyoews%2Fnotify
title: Kanban

text:
Kara is [[Todo Plugin]] which we like because it stores its data in the tiddler we are writing. This means that regardless of having the [[Kara Plugin]] installed it is possible to make sense of the content of the page-item.

<<checklist>>

There are three main thins we can do with [[Kara]]:

# Simple checklist
# Interstitial Journaling (see below)
# [[Automatic Checklist]]

!! Time tracking
We can add a journal like this:
<<interstitial mode:"reverse">>

@@.todo
[ ] Local checklist item
[ ] Nice and simple
@@

@@.interstitial
* ''01:11'' Going to sleep now...
* ''01:11'' Looks like I'll need a couple more days just learning best customisations for TiddlyWiki
@@
title: Kara

description: Mobile apps for iOS and Android. We want these to be minimal and maintainable.
title: Mobile Guide

text: We want to be able to have TiddlyWiki call Livecode, as well as Livecode call TiddlyWiki.
title: Tiddly Livecode Roundtrip

description: A project to create a new form of standard document format we call a Guide. Guides are performative contracts that we use in [[Hitchhiker's Guide to Earth]].
title: TiddlyGuide
